item.description:
Hi, join us for an afternoon show at the Rochester Opera House as we watch "ANNIE" please bring any children that you have for a fun show!

We will meet in the lobby

See you there!

Peter

Upbeat, Uplifting Broadway Musical Classic

It's a hard-knock life for spunky, red-haired orphan Annie, who resides at the Municipal Orphanage in New York City. Annie is the one voice of hope for her fellow orphans who are under the supervision of the tyrannical Miss Hannigan. Dreaming of reuniting with her parents, Annie briefly escapes to the streets, where she befriends a stray dog that she names Sandy. Caught and returned to the orphanage, Annie barely misses a beating, when Grace Farrell, secretary to billionaire politician Oliver Warbucks, arrives. In order to improve his image, Warbucks is looking for a child to spend Christmas at his mansion. Farrell decides the scrappy red-haired orphan would be just perfect. with live music directed by Kathy Fink.

Tickets: $16/$12

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: ANNIE
